member.name: T:Microsoft.Web.WebPages.OAuth.OAuthWebSecurity
member.summary: Manages security that uses OAuth authentication providers like Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Windows Live and OpenID authentication providers like Google and Yahoo.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Web.WebPages.OAuth.OAuthWebSecurity.CreateOrUpdateAccount(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates or updates the account using the specified provider and user ID for the provider ID and associate the new account with the specified user name.
member.param: The user ID for the specified provider.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Web.WebPages.OAuth.OAuthWebSecurity.DeleteAccount(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Deletes the specified membership account.
member.returns: true if the account was deleted, or false if it was not.
member.param: The user ID for the specified provider.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Web.WebPages.OAuth.OAuthWebSecurity.GetAccountsFromUserName(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the account or accounts that are associated using the specified user name.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Web.WebPages.OAuth.OAuthWebSecurity.GetOAuthClientData(System.String)
member.summary: Returns an OAuth authentication client data with the specified provider.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Web.WebPages.OAuth.OAuthWebSecurity.GetUserName(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the user ID for the specified OAuth or OpenID provider and provider user ID.
member.returns: The user ID, or null if there is no user ID associated with the OAuth or Open ID provider user ID.
member.param: The user ID for the specified provider.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Web.WebPages.OAuth.OAuthWebSecurity.HasLocalAccount(System.Int32)
member.summary: Indicates whether the user has local account.
member.returns: true if the user has local account; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.WebPages.OAuth.OAuthWebSecurity.IsAuthenticatedWithOAuth
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the user has been authenticated using OAuth.
member.returns: true if the user has been authenticated using OAuth; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Web.WebPages.OAuth.OAuthWebSecurity.Login(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Logs the user in.
member.returns: true if login was successful; otherwise, false.
member.param: The user ID for the specified provider.
true to create a persistent cookie so that the login information is saved across browser sessions; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Requests the specified provider to start the authentication by directing users to an external website.

member.summary: Requests the specified provider to start the authentication by directing users to an external website, and directs the provider to redirect the user to the specified URL when authentication is successful.
member.param: The URL to return to when authentication is successful.
